comments.body: @astrochun Welcome to Princeton! Looks like previously DRDS folks (the team I'm on) were reviewing PRs here. However, Kevin is no longer on our team.  Are you hoping someone on our team will review this? Maybe we should talk about process? Looking forward to working with you!

> @astrochun Welcome to Princeton! Looks like previously DRDS folks (the team I'm on) were reviewing PRs here. However, Kevin is no longer on our team. Are you hoping someone on our team will review this? Maybe we should talk about process? Looking forward to working with you!

Yes, let's speak about process as I would like to follow whatever workflows and best practices your team have. This PR as well as other issues that I created were in part to understand `dspace-osti` as we are preparing for end of fiscal year submission. Wasn't sure who is best equipped to review this PR.

servers logged into to see if errors in the logs, but things are working again for everyone.  @escowles  closing ticket, but will reopen if error occurs again.

figgy.title: Bad tiff vol04 108 needs to be reingested

comments.body:
reingested: https://figgy.princeton.edu/catalog/9a86eabd-ec92-4401-8f23-288bc5a12be9

original scanned map still flagged and in figgy. emailed Vicki P. and Jen M. for help with getting the "see the map" label removed from the catalog record, @eliotjordan
label has been removed in the catalog record by Jen, @eliotjordan Closing ticket. Please reopen if i missed anything.
Found this on the isilon but under a bib 5401789 and 4 folders within. ingesting folder 1 to C1241_c01 and so on.

ingested these 4: https://figgy.princeton.edu/catalog?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=C1241

wrote to Alexis to get confirmation on visibility/etc... before completing. closing ticket.

@escowles the link has a 404 error. do you have any more information on this collection? I looked in figgy and found these ingests:  https://figgy.princeton.edu/?f%5Bmember_of_collection_titles_ssim%5D%5B%5D=Granville+Wilcox+Correspondence+C1261
That ticket's in a private repository (and closed), and since the content is in figgy and linked to the finding aid, I'm closing this.

@cwulfman  from my notes and also in the description for PUDL 130: PUDL 130 is a group of items considered to be Graphic Arts (GA) treasures. This combines issue#3932 with all other items in PUDL0130 (GA treasures). 8555444:Engleman (#3932) ingest as MVW + Link to MARC record KEL will do 6109684: this is a periodical with its own MODS metadata for each issue. what to do? Ingest as MVW? what happens to the metadata? 
@cwulfman GC060: 2 oversized scrapbooks (2 volumes) prepared by Elmer Adler prepared by GA. Not cataloged at the time. Title: "Princeton print club, 1941-1945". Just tiffs. once cataloged with a bib record, we can ingest this as is. KEL can do. 

Outstanding/still suppressed:
Contact Jennifer Baxmeyer 3051613: each one has its own separate VRA record. @escowles there are separate Marc records for each plate (presumably) but slightly richer VRA metadata in the PUDL. @kelea99 can do a representative sample of what exactly is missing in the Marc. but what is the preferred way forward?
------------------------
- [ X] 5240761 IN FIGGY
- [X ] 6109684 IN FIGGY
- [ X] 8555444 (this is the Engelmann again. although it does not come up in any search in figgy, it is defo there).
- [X ] GC060: 2 oversized scrapbooks (2 volumes) prepared by Elmer Adler prepared by GA. (both have their own bib ids and are ingested individually in figgy: [Volume 1](https://figgy.princeton.edu/catalog/ac14913e-7482-4dc6-b2a1-fe0976943bc4) ; [Volume 2](https://figgy.princeton.edu/catalog/ac14913e-7482-4dc6-b2a1-fe0976943bc4)
-
Hm, the tests are failing now in CI, seems likely due to the WebMock change. Shall we try removing that commit?

oawaiver.title: Address deployment bugs for static asset resolution

comments.body: This was fully resolved with https://github.com/pulibrary/oawaiver/compare/issues-14-jrgriffiniii-cas...jrgriffiniii-fix-deployments

The commits for https://github.com/pulibrary/oawaiver/compare/issues-14-jrgriffiniii-cas...jrgriffiniii-fix-deployments and https://github.com/pulibrary/princeton_ansible/pull/2418 ensure that the Solr indexes are created for indexing using the `sunspot` Gem, as well as provide support for migrating the MySQL database tables to PostgreSQL.

oawaiver.title: Integrates support for CAS using OmniAuth
Updates the Solr configuration, migrates ActiveRecord to PostgreSQL, and integrates Webpacker 5.2 releases for deployment
Updates the Solr Collection names (in response to the princeton_ansible and pul_solr updates)

comments.body: Looking the record's staff view: `856 4 u| https://ezproxy.lau.edu.lb:2443/login?url=https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-662-61068-8 y| View Full Text`. Looks like incorrect entry. Is this part of a cleanup in alma?
I asked in the alma-cataloging-and-inventory-mngmt channel if it's possible to update the 856. @kconnellmail will update it.

Record updated.  URL has incorrectly formatted (with EZProxy prefix in the 856 & Portfolio Linking).  The 856 was added to a print record, too.  We do not have ebook access to the title.  856 & Portfolio deleted.  Marc record cleaned up. Print holdings remain.
